jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced Emergency Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  The Emergency Room RN provides care for patients with a variety of illnesses or trauma requiring emergency attention and must be able to recognize and effectively treat life-threatening conditions. Emergency Room nurses perform a focused assessment of chief complaints of each patient and triages accordingly to encourage effective flow through the emergency care system.  1+ year of recent Emergency RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
